Verses: 1 thangal Lakkaththinpadi Irukkira Isravel Puththirarukku Vamsangalin Thalaivarum, Aayiraththukku Servaikkaararum, Nootrirku Servaikkaararum, Ivargaludaiya Thalaivarum Vaikkappattirundhaargal; Ivargal Varushaththilundaana Maadhangalilellaam Maadhaththirku Maadham Raajaavai Sevikkiradharku Vagukkappatta Varisaigalinpadiyellaam Maarimaari Varuvaargal; Ovvoru Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
2 mudhalaavadhu Maadhaththukku Mudhal Vaguppinmel Sapthiyelin Kumaaran Yashopeyaam Irundhaan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
3 avan Peresin Sandhadhiyaaril Sagala Senaapadhigalin Thalaivanaayirundhu Mudhal Maadham Visaariththaan.
4 irandaavadhu Maadhaththin Vaguppinmel Akogiyanaana Thodhaayi Irundhaan; Avan Vaguppile Mikloth Thalakarththanaayirundhaan; Avan Vaguppile Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
5 moondraavadhu Maadhaththin Moondraam Senaapadhi Yoidhaavin Kumaaranaagiya Penaayaa Ennum Thalaimaiyaana Pradhaani Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
6 indhap Penaayaa Andha Muppadhu Paraakkiramasaaligalil Oruvanum Andha Muppadhu Pergalin Thalaivanumaayirundhaan; Avanudaiya Vaguppai Avan Kumaaranaagiya Amisabaadh Visaariththaan.
7 naalaavadhu Maadhaththin Naalaam Senaapadhi Yovaabin Sagodharanaagiya Aasagelum, Avanukkuppinbu Avan Kumaaran Septhiyaavume; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
8 aindhaavadhu Maadhaththin Aindhaam Senaapadhi Israagiyanaana Samkoodh Enbavan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
9 aaraavadhu Maadhaththin Aaraam Senaapadhi Ikkesin Kumaaran Eeraa Ennum Thekkoviyan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
10 ezhaavadhu Maadhaththin Ezhaam Senaapadhi Eppiraayeem Puththiraril Oruvanaagiya Eles Ennum Peloniyan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
11 ettaavadhu Maadhaththin Ettaam Senaapadhi Saariyaril Oruvanaagiya Sipekkaayi Ennum Ooshaaththiyan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
12 onbadhaavadhu Maadhaththin Onbadhaam Senaapadhi Benyameenaril Abiyesar Ennum Aanadhoththaan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
13 paththaavadhu Maadhaththin Paththaam Senaapadhi Saariyaril Oruvanaagiya Makraayi Ennum Neththobaaththiyan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
14 padhinoraavadhu Maadhaththin Padhinoraam Senaapadhi Eppiraayeem Puththiraril Penaayaa Ennum Praththoniyan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
15 pannirandaavadhu Maadhaththin Pannirandaam Senaapadhi Odhniyel Sandhadhiyaana Eldhaayi Ennum Neththobaaththiyan; Avan Vaguppil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Irundhaargal.
16 isravel Koththirangalukkuth Thalaivargal; Roobaniyarukkuth Thalaivan Sikriyin Kumaaran Eliyesar; Simiyoniyarukku Maakkaavin Kumaaran Seppaththiyaa.
17 leviyarukku Kemuvelin Kumaaran Ashaabiyaa; Aaron Sandhadhikku Saadhok.
18 yoodhaavukku Dhaaveedhin Sagodhararil Oruvanaagiya Elikoo; Isakkaarukku Migaavelin Kumaaran Omri.
19 sebulonukku Opthiyaavin Kumaaran Ismaayaa; Napthalikku Asriyelin Kumaaran Erimodh.
20 eppiraayeem Puththirarukku Asasiyaavin Kumaaran Oseyaa; Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththirkup Pedhaayaavin Kumaaran Yovel.
21 kileyaaththilulla Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththirku Sagariyaavin Kumaaran Iththo; Benyameenukku Apnerin Kumaaran Yaasiyel.
22 thaanukku Erogaamin Kumaaran Asaariyel; Ivargal Isravel Koththirangalukkuth Thalaivaraayirundhaargal.

23 isravelai Vaanaththin Natchaththirangal Aththanaiyaaip Perugappannuven Endru Karththar Solliyirundhapadiyaal; Dhaaveedhu Irubadhu Vayadhumudhal Adharku Keezhppattavargalin Lakkaththaiththogaiyetravillai.
24 seruyaavin Kumaaran Yovaab Ennaththuvakkiyum Mudikkaadheponaan; Adharkaaga Isravelinmel Kadunkobam Vandhadhu; Aadhalaal Andhaththogai Dhaaveedhu Raajaavin Naalaagamakkanakkile Eravillai.
25 raajaavudaiya Pokkishangalinmel Aadhiyelin Kumaaran Asmaaveththum, Pattanangalilum Graamangalilum Thurukkangalilumulla Nilaththin Varumaana Pandagasaalaigalinmel Usiyaavin Kumaaran Yonaththaanum,
26 nilaththaip Payirida Vayalveliyin Velaiseygiravargalinmel Kelooppinkumaaran Esriyum,
27 dhraatchaththottangalinmel Raamaaththiyanaana Seemeyum, Dhraatchaththottangalin Varaththaagiya Dhraatcharasam Vaikkum Idangalinmel Sipmiyanaagiya Sapthiyum,
28 pallaththaakkugalilulla Olivamarangalinmelum Musukkattai Virutchangalinmelum Kedheriyanaana Paalkaanaanum, Enney Kidangugalinmel Yovaasum,
29 saaronil Meygira Maadugalinmel Saaroniyanaana Sidhraayum, Pallaththaakkugalilulla Maadugalinmel Adhlaayin Kumaaran Saappaaththum,
30 ottagangalinmel Ismaveliyanaagiya Opilum, Kazhudhaigalinmel Meronoththiyanaagiya Egedhiyaavum,
31 aadugalinmel Aagaariyanaana Yaasisum Visaarippukkaararaayirundhaargal; Ivargalellaarum Dhaaveedhu Raajaavinporulgalukku Visaarippukkaararaayirundhaargal.
32 dhaaveedhin Siriya Thagappanaagiya Yonaththaan Ennum Buththiyum Padippumulla Manushan Aalosanaikkaaranaayirundhaan; Akmoniyin Kumaaran Yegiyel Raajaavin Kumaararodirundhaan.
33 agiththoppel Raajaavukku Aalosanaikkaaranaayirundhaan; Arkiyanaana Ooshaayi Raajaavin Thozhanaayirundhaan.
34 penaayaavin Kumaaran Yoidhaavum Abiyaththaarum Agiththoppelukku Udhaviyaayirundhaargal; Yovaab Raajaavin Padaiththalaivanaayirundhaan.
